fields.title: Getting Started with Trading App
fields.content:
Welcome to our Trading App üöÄ. This guide helps you set up your account, verify KYC, and start trading within minutes.

  • Create an account
  • Verify identity
  • Deposit funds
  • Start trading securely

fields.title: API Integration Guide
fields.content:
Our API allows developers to build custom trading bots, integrate market data, and manage portfolios programmatically.

Steps:

  1. Generate API key in profile settings
  2. Use our REST API or WebSocket
  3. Implement trading strategies

fields.title: Margin Trading Guide
fields.content:
Margin trading allows you to trade with leverage and increase potential profits. Please trade responsibly ‚ö†Ô∏è.

  • Understand risks
  • Set stop-loss orders
  • Monitor positions closely

fields.title: Risk Management Basics
fields.content:
Proper risk management is key to long-term success in trading.

  • Never risk more than 2% per trade
  • Diversify portfolio
  • Use take-profit and stop-loss orders
